query: WITH entities AS (SELECT id FROM core_obligations WHERE status IN ('due', 'overdue') AND defaulted_date IS NOT NULL AND defaulted_date <= $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $2 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_obligation_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.id, e.sequence
